headline: JPMorgan Lowers the Firm’s PT on SBA Communications (SBAC) Stock
summary: SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ:SBAC) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 12, JPMorgan analyst Richard Choe reduced the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $240 from $245, while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. Notably, the firm lowered new leasing estimates for the tower companies ahead of […]

headline: Assessing SBA Communications (SBAC) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Longer Term Weakness
summary: SBA Communications (SBAC) has drawn attention after recent trading left the shares around $191.99, with mixed returns over the past year and multi year period, prompting a closer look at its fundamentals. See our latest analysis for SBA Communications. The latest share price of $191.99 comes after a 7 day share price return of 5.86%, set against a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 4.03% and a 3 year total shareholder return decline of 31.21%.
